title: President Obama to Deliver Commencement Address at US Naval Academy in Annapolis | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




May 18, 2009

 



President Obama to Deliver Commencement Address at US Naval Academy in Annapolis




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  ________________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                                       May 18, 2009  President Obama to Deliver Commencement Address at US Naval Academy in Annapolis   WASHINGTON, DC – On Friday, May 22, 2009, President Barack Obama will deliver the commencement address at the US Naval Academy in Annapolis, Maryland.   All media logistics and credentialing is being handled by the Naval Academy.  For information and credentials, please go to http://www.usna.edu/PAO/vpk09/indexvpk09.htm. The deadline to request credentials is Wednesday, May 20th at 5:00PM EDT.
